<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The abstract base class GCMetadataPrinter supports writing GC metadata tables</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as assembly code. This is a separate class from GCStrategy in order to allow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// users of the LLVM JIT to avoid linking with the AsmWriter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Subclasses of GCMetadataPrinter must be registered using the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GCMetadataPrinterRegistry. This is separate from the GCStrategy itself</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because these subclasses are logically plugins for the AsmWriter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
